reviews.review_msg: The course was tough for me but overall the lecture is pretty clear. Emrul works hard for students. I did not do well in final and waiting for the grade. Fingers crossed!

I'm very surprised to see what some people wrote about him! He is an amazing prof and works really hard for his students. I didn't do that well in his final but it's my fault. I will take his class again. I found him very inspirational.
Probably the best prof out there. He knows what it's like to be a student and have a full course load so he's understanding that way if you just talk to him.

Not sure what happened to his previous profile but this prof was an amazing lecturer! good real life examples, can simplify complicated concepts to make it understandable while at the same time being funny! i always looked forward to this class!
Good and funny guy. Although the marking was a bit weird since they were marked by TAs
Nice prof! Attend the lecture is very useful. The course is hard but he made it easy. TAKE HIS COURSE!!!!
very good prof,lectures are helpful and interesting. lecture slide are important.

You can literally spend 2 hours reading text and not understanding a concept but it takes him 5 minutes to explain. His best quality is he can break down complex subject while being funny and using irl examples! Lecture prob all you need to do decent (ie. B). I still recommend reading the text if u want A- to differentiate urself from everyone else

Most enjoyable Econ Prof! And he genuinely wants you to learn and do well! Majority of his teaching is grounded in theory and always applies it in the practicality of today's market. Attend lectures as he often puts emphasis on what he will test you and his notes/slides are clear, concise, and easy to follow
Nice Prof!
very good prof. easy and helpful
Great prof! Sweet and fun :)

Course is a blend of theory and practice. Final was tough. Midterm was easy. The paper was a pain. Hasan tries hard to make difficult concepts easy. As long as u attend all the classes and understand the slides, u will be fine.
Very good. Will take more courses in future.
Awesome prof! Highly recommended.
worst prof ever

I liked him. His lecture is fun. I'd recommend he should use less heavy English words in exams. It's hard for international students to understand. But he is very helpful and a sweet guy. I hope to take more courses with him.

He is an excellent prof. Even though I did not get a good grade, but I don't blame the prof for that. I just didn't study and the final was a bit hard. He is funny! He is clear in class about what he wants. He will also give you expert suggestions about studies whenever u need. Very knowledgable and makes the course interesting. Very recommended.
Worst prof I have ever taken, he is such a hypocrite dont even care his student, dont even speak english. I got the class's highest grade on midterm and also did good job on final, only received B.
It's highly recommended to have name changed into English sounding name at least for you to be able to get a fair marks.
Great Prof, you can do well in his class. Exams are easy and fair!

Professor has a good sense of humor and the midterm and final are not so hard.He is very friendly and kind to answer your any questions. However, the course is challenging and need to work hard after class. It is necessary to read textbook since the lecture slides are not very detailed.  But you can learn a lot by taking this course.

Interesting course, nice prof. Less work but there will be a 5-10page paper to do ( only this one and it will help for to understand course material deeply). Midterm and final  is not hard, especially for final, do it sample exam, It very useful!!
